author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
China is facing one of its worst environmental breakdowns in recent years. From catastrophic floods drowning entire cities to brutal droughts leaving farmland cracked and useless, disaster is hitting from all directions—often at the same time.

In this video, we break down the multi-disaster crisis sweeping across China:

Torrential rain and deadly flooding in Wuhan, Guilin, and Hunan

Crumbling “sponge city” infrastructure despite billions spent

Landslides, collapsed bridges, and washed-out homes

Massive crop failure due to hail and heatwaves in Henan, Heilongjiang, and Anhui

Drought-stricken rivers and dry reservoirs, worsened by the CCP’s massive water diversion projects

Government flood discharge cover-ups and media suppression

Rural Chinese families left to pray for rain while authorities call it “malicious hype”

All of this is happening under the watch of the Chinese Communist Party, which seems more focused on appearances than actually saving lives. As the working poor st
title: China Hit by Floods, Droughts, Hailstorms, and Collapsing Infrastructure—Multiple Disasters Strike

author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
Texas just made history by passing the Transnational Repression Act — the first state law in the U.S. directly targeting illegal overseas operations by foreign regimes like the Chinese Communist Party. This sweeping legislation cracks down on CCP agents who engage in harassment, stalking, and threats against dissidents on American soil, escalating penalties up to life in prison. The law directly confronts Beijing’s Operation Fox Hunt — a covert campaign of intimidation used to silence Falun Gong practitioners, human rights lawyers, and Chinese dissidents abroad.
With Texas sheriffs being trained to recognize transnational repression and a mandate for public safety departments to track such threats, this could mark the beginning of a nationwide pushback.

🔍 What is Operation Fox Hunt?
🕵️‍♂️ How does this law expose CCP tactics?
⚖️ What happens to Chinese agents now caught in the act?
title: Texas Declares War on CCP’s Fox Hunt — New Law Could Land Agents in Prison for Life
